name: Just Another Dream
summary_text: When a fateful injury sparks an ordinary girl to have foretelling dreams, she is forced into a race against time to save her family and prove her sanity....or is it JUST ANOTHER DREAM? Action/Drama.

name: Truth or Dare
summary_text: A harmless game of Truth or Dare among friends turns deadly when someone - or something - begins to punish those who tell a lie or refuse the dare.

name: The Final Girls
summary_text: A young woman grieving the loss of her mother, a famous scream queen from the 1980s, finds herself pulled into the world of her mom's most famous movie. Reunited, the women must fight off the film's maniacal killer.

name: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
summary_text: Laura Palmer's harrowing final days are chronicled one year after the murder of Teresa Banks, a resident of Twin Peaks' neighboring town.

name: Super Troopers
summary_text: Five Vermont state troopers, avid pranksters with a knack for screwing up, try to save their jobs and out-do the local police department by solving a crime.

name: 22 Jump Street
summary_text: After making their way through high school (twice), big changes are in store for officers Schmidt and Jenko when they go deep undercover at a local college.

name: Tough Guys Don't Dance
summary_text: Writer, ex-con and 40-something bottle-baby Tim Madden, who is prone to black-outs, awakens from a two-week bender to discover a pool of blood in his car, a blond woman's severed head in ...                See full summary »

name: Hotel Desire
summary_text: A young single mother drops her son of at the bus stop to visit his dad in Paris. After being late for work, she almost gets fired. At the end of her duties she gets into a tricky situation which she handles, with the advice her colleague gave her.

name: The 355
summary_text: When a top-secret weapon falls into mercenary hands, a wild card CIA agent joins forces with three international agents on a lethal mission to retrieve it, while staying a step ahead of a mysterious woman who's tracking their every move.
"21" is the fact-based story about six MIT students who were trained to become experts in card counting and subsequently took Vegas casinos for millions in winnings.

name: Agatha and the Truth of Murder
summary_text: In 1926, with her personal life in tatters and her writing in crisis, a young Agatha Christie decides to solve a real-life murder.

name: Mask
summary_text: A teenager with a massive facial skull deformity and biker gang mother attempt to live as normal a life as possible under the circumstances.

name: Snabba Cash
summary_text: The entrepreneurial jet set as well as the criminal world is more brutal, chaotic and ruthless than ever. When these two worlds collide, loyalty, friendships and business partners will all be tested in the never-ending quest for easy money.

name: I Am Number Four
summary_text: Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.

name: Frivolous Lola
summary_text: Set in the 1950s Italian countryside, the film tells the story of Lola and Masetto, a young couple whose views on premarital sex differ drastically.

name: Eastern Promises
summary_text: A teenager who dies during childbirth leaves clues in her journal that could tie her child to a rape involving a violent Russian mob family.

name: George Lopez
summary_text: Comedian George Lopez stars as a Los Angeles manufacturing plant manager attempting to deal with his wacky family along with other random mishaps.

name: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
summary_text: When her mother disappears, Clary Fray learns that she descends from a line of warriors who protect our world from demons. She joins forces with others like her and heads into a dangerous alternate New York called the Shadow World.

name: Everything's Gonna Be Okay
summary_text: After their father's untimely death, Nicholas and his two half-sisters are left to cope with not only a devastating loss, but also the realization that Nicholas is the one who will have to rise to the occasion and hold it all together.

name: Bizaardvark
summary_text: Centers on best friends Paige and Frankie who express their offbeat individuality through funny music videos on their vlog channel Bizaardvark.

name: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
summary_text: Five sisters in 19th century England must cope with the pressures to marry while protecting themselves from a growing population of zombies.

name: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
summary_text: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, Oceanographer Steve Zissou (Bill Murray) rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

name: The Fundamentals of Caring
summary_text: A man suffering a family loss enrolls in a class about care-giving that changes his perspective on life.

name: Pocahontas
summary_text: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth century Virginia.

name: White Lines
summary_text: A woman tries to solve the mysterious death of her brother, a famous DJ who disappeared from Ibiza many years ago.

name: Lord of the Flies
summary_text: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.

name: Joy Ride
summary_text: Three young people on a road trip from Colorado to New Jersey talk to a trucker on their CB radio, then must escape when he turns out to be a psychotic killer.

name: Midway
summary_text: A dramatization of the battle that was widely heralded as a turning point of the Pacific Theatre of World War II.

name: Practical Magic
summary_text: Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.

name: Ma Rainey's Black Bottom
summary_text: Tensions rise when trailblazing blues singer Ma Rainey and her band gather at a recording studio in Chicago in 1927.

name: Freaks
summary_text: A bold girl discovers a bizarre, threatening, and mysterious new world beyond her front door after she escapes her father's protective and paranoid control.

name: The Spy
summary_text: Based on the life of the Israeli spy, Eli Cohen.

name: Hostel: Part III
summary_text: Four men attending a bachelor party in Las Vegas fall prey to the Elite Hunting Club, who are hosting a gruesome game show of torture.

name: Vivo
summary_text: Vivo, Sony Pictures Animation's first-ever musical adventure featuring all-new original songs from Lin-Manuel Miranda, will take audiences on an epic adventure to gorgeous and vibrant locations never before seen in animation.

name: Greater
summary_text: The story of Brandon Burlsworth, possibly the greatest walk-on in the history of college football.

name: London Has Fallen
summary_text: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

name: Sorry to Bother You
summary_text: In an alternate present-day version of Oakland, telemarketer Cassius Green discovers a magical key to professional success, propelling him into a universe of greed.

name: Ghost in the Shell
summary_text: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

name: Miss Fisher's Murder Mysteries
summary_text: A female sleuth sashays through the back lanes and jazz clubs of Melbourne in the late 1920s, fighting injustice with her pearl-handled pistol and her dagger-sharp wit.

name: Soap
summary_text: The soap-operish antics of two families: the Campbells and the Tates.

name: Knowing
summary_text: M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe.

name: Boy Erased
summary_text: The son of a Baptist preacher unwillingly participates in a church-supported gay conversion program after being forcibly outed to his parents.

name: All in the Family
summary_text: A working class man constantly squabbles with his family over the important issues of the day.

name: Tomorrowland
summary_text: Bound by a shared destiny, a teen bursting with scientific curiosity and a former boy-genius inventor embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place somewhere in time and space that exists in their collective memory.

name: Wonder Wheel
summary_text: On Coney Island in the 1950s, a lifeguard tells the story of a middle-aged carousel operator, his beleaguered wife, and the visitor who turns their lives upside-down.

name: Violet Evergarden
summary_text: In the aftermath of a great war, Violet Evergarden, a young female ex-soldier, gets a job at a writers' agency and goes on assignments to create letters that can connect people.

name: The Conversation
summary_text: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.

name: The Huntsman: Winter's War
summary_text: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna.

name: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
summary_text: A teenage girl's secret love letters are exposed and wreak havoc on her love life.

name: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
summary_text: As a string of mysterious killings grips Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

name: Carnaval
summary_text: After a breakup, an influencer takes her friends on a free trip to Bahia's vibrant Carnival, where she learns life's not just about social media likes.

name: The Wisdom of Trauma
summary_text: 1 in 5 Americans are diagnosed with mental illness every year. Suicide is the second most common cause of death in the US for youth aged 15-24, and kills over 48,300 in the US and 800,000 ...                See full summary »

name: Die Hard with a Vengeance
summary_text: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

name: Rogue
summary_text: O'Hara is a mercenary leading a squad of soldiers on their mission to rescue hostages in remote part of Africa. Unfortunately the mission goes wrong and the team are stranded, forced to survive against the local rebels.

name: Death Note
summary_text: A high school student named Light Turner discovers a mysterious notebook that has the power to kill anyone whose name is written within its pages, and launches a secret crusade to rid the world of criminals.

name: Bolt
summary_text: The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.

name: Begin Again
summary_text: A chance encounter between a down-and-out music-business executive and a young singer-songwriter, new to Manhattan, turns into a promising collaboration between the two talents.

name: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
summary_text: Beatrice Prior must confront her inner demons and continue her fight against a powerful alliance which threatens to tear her society apart with the help from others on her side.

name: Are You Afraid of the Dark?
summary_text: A group of kids get together in the woods, and tell ghost stories.

name: Spell
summary_text: A man crash lands in rural Appalachia and awakens in the attic of a traditional Hoodoo practitioner. He desperately tries to break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual before the rise of the blood moon.

name: The Running Man
summary_text: In a dystopian America, a falsely convicted policeman gets his shot at freedom when he must forcibly participate in a TV game show where convicts, runners, must battle killers for their freedom.

name: The Gambler
summary_text: Literature professor and gambler Jim Bennett's debt causes him to borrow money from his mother and a loan shark. Further complicating his situation, is his relationship with one of his students. Will Bennett risk his life for a second chance?

name: Too Close
summary_text: A forensic psychiatrist has to assess a woman accused of a heinous crime, who claims she can't remember a thing.

name: Superhero Movie
summary_text: Orphaned high school student Rick Riker is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly, develops super powers (except for the ability to fly), and becomes a hero.

name: Anger Management
summary_text: Dave Buznik is a businessman who is wrongly sentenced to an anger management program, where he meets an aggressive instructor.

name: Terrifier
summary_text: On Halloween night, Tara Heyes finds herself as the obsession of a sadistic murderer known as Art the Clown.

name: Blue Lagoon: The Awakening
summary_text: Two high school students become stranded on a tropical island and must rely on each other for survival. They learn more about themselves and each other while falling in love.

name: The Cloverfield Paradox
summary_text: Orbiting a planet on the brink of war, scientists test a device to solve an energy crisis, and end up face-to-face with a dark alternate reality.

name: Redemption Day
summary_text: When the love of his life is kidnapped and held for ransom by terrorists, a war hero Brad Paxton races against the clock to rescue her in a daring and deadly operation that pits him against the most powerful and shadowy forces.

name: Neighbours
summary_text: Australian soap opera exploring the lives and relationships of the residents of Ramsay Street in Erinsborough.

name: Team America: World Police
summary_text: Popular Broadway actor Gary Johnston is recruited by the elite counter-terrorism organization Team America: World Police. As the world begins to crumble around him, he must battle with terrorists, celebrities and falling in love.

name: Live Free or Die Hard
summary_text: John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.

name: The Hollow Crown
summary_text: A mini-series of adaptations of Shakespeare's history plays: Richard II, Henry IV: Parts 1 and 2, and Henry V.

name: Fatale
summary_text: After a one-night stand, a successful married man finds himself entangled in a cunning police detective's latest investigation.

name: In the Shadow of the Moon
summary_text: A Philadelphia police officer struggles with a lifelong obsession to track down a mysterious serial killer whose crimes defy explanation.

name: Dawn of the Dead
summary_text: Following an ever-growing epidemic of zombies that have risen from the dead, two Philadelphia S.W.A.T. team members, a traffic reporter, and his television executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

name: Cruising
summary_text: A police detective goes undercover in the underground S&M gay subculture of New York City to catch a serial killer who is preying on gay men.

name: Infinity Train
summary_text: Various people find themselves on a mysterious train with an endless number of cars, each one being its own universe, and they must find a way to get home in this animated anthology series.

name: Blade: Trinity
summary_text: Blade, now a wanted man by the FBI, must join forces with the Nightstalkers to face his most challenging enemy yet: Dracula.

name: Battlestar Galactica
summary_text: After the destruction of the Twelve Colonies of Mankind, the last major fighter carrier leads a makeshift fugitive fleet on a desperate search for the legendary planet Earth.

name: Flowers
summary_text: Dark comedy about the eccentric members of the Flowers family. Maurice and Deborah are barely together but yet to divorce. They live with Maurice's batty mother and their maladjusted twin children.

name: Miracle in Cell No. 7
summary_text: A story of love between a mentally-ill father who was wrongly accused of murder and his lovely six year old daughter. Prison will be their home. Based on the 2013 Korean movie Miracle in Cell No. 7 (2013).

name: Knightfall
summary_text: A look at the final days of the Knights Templar during the 14th century.

name: October Faction
summary_text: A semi-retired couple who work for a clandestine monster hunting agency discover dark family secrets and the truth about their employer after their magically inclined nigh adult kids reawaken a witch bent on revenge.

name: 40 Days and 40 Nights
summary_text: After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.

name: Yes Man
summary_text: A man challenges himself to say "yes" to everything.

name: Sijipeuseu: The Myth
summary_text: An unfathomable incident introduces a genius engineer to dangerous secrets of the world, and to a woman from the future who's come looking for him.

name: Party of Five
summary_text: 5 siblings raise each other following their parents' untimely deaths.

name: Where the Heart Is
summary_text: A pregnant seventeen-year-old rebuilds her life after being abandoned by her boyfriend at a Walmart in Sequoyah, Oklahoma.

name: Penny Dreadful: City of Angels
summary_text: When a grisly murder shocks Los Angeles in 1938, Detective Tiago Vega and his partner Lewis Michener become embroiled in an epic story that reflects the troubled history of the city.

name: A Private War
summary_text: One of the most celebrated war correspondents of our time, Marie Colvin is an utterly fearless and rebellious spirit, driven to the frontline of conflicts across the globe to give voice to the voiceless.

name: The Basketball Diaries
summary_text: A teenager finds his dreams of becoming a basketball star threatened after he free falls into the harrowing world of drug addiction.

name: Forgotten
summary_text: When his abducted brother returns seemingly a different man with no memory of the past 19 days, Jin-seok chases after the truth behind the kidnapping.

name: Flash Gordon
summary_text: A football player and his friends travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyranny of Ming the Merciless to save Earth.

name: Nine Days
summary_text: A reclusive man conducts a series of interviews with human souls for a chance to be born.

name: Revenge
summary_text: Never take your mistress on an annual guys' getaway, especially one devoted to hunting - a violent lesson for three wealthy married men.

name: Before I Go to Sleep
summary_text: A woman wakes up every day, remembering nothing as a result of a traumatic accident in her past. One day, new terrifying truths emerge that force her to question everyone around her.

name: The Beach Bum
summary_text: A rebellious stoner named Moondog lives life by his own rules.

name: Drillbit Taylor
summary_text: Three kids hire a low-budget bodyguard to protect them from the playground bully.

name: The Firm
summary_text: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

name: Abominable
summary_text: Three teenagers must help a Yeti return to his family while avoiding a wealthy man and a zoologist who want him for their own needs.

name: RoboCop
summary_text: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy, a loving husband, father and good cop, is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

name: Year One
summary_text: After being banished from their tribe, two hunter-gatherers encounter Biblical characters and eventually wind up in the city of Sodom.

name: Resident Evil: Extinction
summary_text: Survivors of the Raccoon City catastrophe travel across the Nevada desert, hoping to make it to Alaska. Alice joins the caravan and their fight against the evil Umbrella Corp.

name: Ghost Rider
summary_text: When motorcycle rider Johnny Blaze sells his soul to the Devil to save his father's life, he is transformed into the Ghost Rider, the Devil's own bounty hunter, and is sent to hunt down sinners.

name: Stateless
summary_text: Inspired by true events; a woman escaping a cult, a refugee fleeing with his family, a father trapped in a dead-end job, and a bureaucrat on the verge of a national scandal find their lives intertwined in an immigration detention centre.

name: Carrie
summary_text: A shy girl, outcasted by her peers and sheltered by her religious mother, unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

name: Breakfast at Tiffany's
summary_text: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

name: Widows
summary_text: Four women with nothing in common except a debt left behind by their dead husbands' criminal activities take fate into their own hands and conspire to forge a future on their own terms.

name: Free State of Jones
summary_text: A disillusioned Confederate army deserter returns to Mississippi and leads a militia of fellow deserters and women in an uprising against the corrupt local Confederate government.

name: Drop Dead Gorgeous
summary_text: A small-town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

name: Beowulf
summary_text: The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel, who is terrorizing Denmark, then Grendel's Mother, who begins killing out of revenge.

name: I Dream of Jeannie
summary_text: A United States astronaut finds his life vastly complicated when he stumbles on to a bottle containing a female genie.

name: Secondhand Lions
summary_text: A coming-of-age story about a shy, young boy sent by his irresponsible mother to spend the summer with his wealthy, eccentric uncles in Texas.

name: Bee Movie
summary_text: Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue them.

name: Double Jeopardy
summary_text: A woman framed for her husband's murder suspects he is still alive; as she has already been tried for the crime, she can't be re-prosecuted if she finds and kills him.

name: Jane Eyre
summary_text: A mousy governess who softens the heart of her employer soon discovers that he's hiding a terrible secret.

name: American Animals
summary_text: Four young men mistake their lives for a movie and attempt one of the most audacious heists in U.S. history.

name: Space: 1999
summary_text: The crew of Moonbase Alpha must struggle to survive when a massive explosion throws the Moon from orbit into deep space.

name: Wizards of Waverly Place
summary_text: The Russo family may be an ordinary family with an average restaurant, but behind close doors, all three children must compete to be the next family wizard.

name: Steve Jobs
summary_text: Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac.

name: The Last Full Measure
summary_text: Thirty-four years after his death, Airman William H. Pitsenbarger, Jr. ("Pits") is awarded the nation's highest military honor, for his actions on the battlefield.

name: Sahara
summary_text: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

name: Samaritan
summary_text: A young boy learns that a superhero who was thought to have gone missing after an epic battle twenty years ago may in fact still be around.

name: Nymphomaniac: Vol. II
summary_text: The continuation of Joe's sexually dictated life delves into the darker aspects of her adulthood, obsessions and what led to her being in Seligman's care.

name: The Cat in the Hat
summary_text: Two bored children have their lives turned upside down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

name: Traces
summary_text: While attending an online forensic course, young lab assistant discovers that the fictitious case study has a link to her past. With a help of two female professors she works on bringing a killer to justice.

name: The Beverly Hillbillies
summary_text: A nouveau riche hillbilly family moves to Beverly Hills and shakes up the privileged society with their hayseed ways.

name: Extract
summary_text: Joel, the owner of an extract plant, tries to contend with myriad personal and professional problems, such as his potentially unfaithful wife and employees who want to take advantage of him.

name: The Family Business
summary_text: By day, the Duncans are an upstanding family who run a thriving exotic car dealership in New York. By night, they live a dangerous secret life. When they come under siege the Duncans will have to stick together or die separately.

name: Taken 3
summary_text: Accused of a ruthless murder he never committed or witnessed, Bryan Mills goes on the run and brings out his particular set of skills to find the true killer and clear his name.

name: Last Tango in Halifax
summary_text: Re-united after 50+ years apart, Celia and Alan decide to marry. At age 16, Alan's late wife failed to pass on a letter from Celia, his longtime crush, with an apology for missing their first date and her forwarding address. Both now have daughters with lover troubles.

name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
summary_text: A journalist is aided by a young female hacker in his search for the killer of a woman who has been dead for forty years.

name: The Musketeers
summary_text: Set on the streets of 17th-century Paris, "The Musketeers" gives a contemporary take on the classic story about a group of highly trained soldiers and bodyguards assigned to protect King and country.

name: Soorarai Pottru
summary_text: Nedumaaran Rajangam "Maara" sets out to make the common man fly and in the process takes on the world's most capital intensive industry and several enemies who stand in his way.

name: Wolfwalkers
summary_text: A young apprentice hunter and her father journey to Ireland to help wipe out the last wolf pack. But everything changes when she befriends a free-spirited girl from a mysterious tribe rumored to transform into wolves by night.

name: Gosford Park
summary_text: Set in the 1930s, this movie brings a group of pretentious rich and famous together for a weekend of relaxation at a hunting resort. But when a murder occurs, each one of these interesting characters becomes a suspect.

name: A Classic Horror Story
summary_text: In this gruesome suspense film, strangers traveling in southern Italy become stranded in the woods, where they must fight desperately to get out alive.

name: Step by Step
summary_text: Two families become one, step by step.

name: Okja
summary_text: A young girl risks everything to prevent a powerful, multinational company from kidnapping her best friend - a fascinating beast named Okja.

name: Street Fighter
summary_text: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

name: The Wicker Man
summary_text: A puritan Police Sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl who the locals claim never existed.

name: From Russia with Love
summary_text: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination plot involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E.

name: The Adventures of Tintin
summary_text: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.

name: Dumplin'
summary_text: Willowdean ('Dumplin'), the plus-size teenage daughter of a former beauty queen, signs up for her mom's Miss Teen Bluebonnet pageant as a protest that escalates when other contestants follow her footsteps, revolutionizing the pageant and their small Texas town.

name: Rush Hour 2
summary_text: Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for a vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam.

name: EastEnders
summary_text: The everyday lives of working-class inhabitants of Albert Square, a traditional Victorian square of terrace houses surrounding a park in the East End of London's Walford borough. The square includes the Queen Vic pub and a street market.

name: Dark Shadows
summary_text: The rich Collins family of Collinsport, Maine is tormented by strange occurrences.

name: Peppermint
summary_text: Five years after her husband and daughter are killed in a senseless act of violence, a woman comes back from self-imposed exile to seek revenge against those responsible and the system that let them go free.

name: Ted 2
summary_text: Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.

name: Capone
summary_text: The 47-year old Al Capone, after 10 years in prison, starts suffering from dementia and comes to be haunted by his violent past.

name: The Nightmare Before Christmas
summary_text: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

name: Dragged Across Concrete
summary_text: Once two overzealous cops get suspended from the force, they must delve into the criminal underworld to get their proper compensation.

name: The Following
summary_text: A brilliant and charismatic, yet psychotic serial killer communicates with other active serial killers and activates a cult of believers following his every command.

name: Tootsie
summary_text: Michael Dorsey, an unsuccessful actor, disguises himself as a woman in order to get a role on a trashy hospital soap.

name: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
summary_text: The Brothers Grimm arrive at the home of a wealthy Grande Dame who speaks of the many legends surrounding the fable of the cinder girl before telling the "true" story of her ancestor.

name: In the Name of the Father
summary_text: A man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

name: Lost Highway
summary_text: Anonymous videotapes presage a musician's murder conviction, and a gangster's girlfriend leads a mechanic astray.

name: PAW Patrol
summary_text: Led by a boy named Ryder, a team of six playful rescue dogs use their individual talents to protect the seaside town of Adventure Bay. The pups are occasionally joined by newer helpers: Cap'n Turbot, Robo-Dog, Everest, and Tracker.

name: Sex and Lucía
summary_text: Various lives converge on an isolated island, all connected by an author whose novel has become inextricably entwined with his own life.

name: Buck Privates
summary_text: Two sidewalk salesman enlist in the army in order to avoid jail, only to find that their drill instructor is the police officer who tried having them imprisoned.

name: Seven Pounds
summary_text: A man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.

name: Piranha 3DD
summary_text: After the events at Lake Victoria, the pre-historic school of blood-thirsty piranhas make their way into a newly opened waterpark.

name: Switched at Birth
summary_text: Two teenage girls' lives are turned upside down when they find out they were switched at birth.

name: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver
summary_text: Former Daily Show host and correspondent John Oliver brings his persona to this weekly news satire program.

name: The Transporter
summary_text: Frank Martin, who "transports" packages for unknown clients, is asked to move a package that soon begins moving, and complications arise.

name: Cowboy Bebop
summary_text: A ragtag crew of bounty hunters chases down the galaxy's most dangerous criminals. They'll save the world - for the right price.

name: Saving Silverman
summary_text: A pair of buddies conspire to save their best friend from marrying the wrong woman.

name: La Reina del Sur
summary_text: Teresa Mendoza returns to Mexico after 8 years to fight with Mexican drug dealers.

name: I Don't Feel at Home in This World Anymore.
summary_text: When a depressed woman is burgled, she finds a new sense of purpose by tracking down the thieves alongside her obnoxious neighbour. But they soon find themselves dangerously out of their depth against a pack of degenerate criminals.

name: The Purge: Election Year
summary_text: Former Police Sergeant Barnes becomes head of security for Senator Charlie Roan, a Presidential candidate targeted for death on Purge night due to her vow to eliminate the Purge.

name: From Dusk Till Dawn: The Series
summary_text: A Texas Ranger is in hot pursuit of the infamous Gecko brothers and their hostages. They all end up trapped in a desert bar secretly run by vampires and discover a vampire conspiracy.

name: Ramy
summary_text: In New Jersey, Ramy, son of Egyptian migrants, begins a spiritual journey, divided between his Muslim community, God, and his friends who see endless possibilities.

name: Monty Python's Life of Brian
summary_text: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

name: Godzilla
summary_text: French nuclear tests irradiate an iguana into a giant monster that heads off to New York City. The American military must chase the monster across the city to stop it before it reproduces.

name: The Holy Mountain
summary_text: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a messianic character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

name: Swingers
summary_text: A wannabe actor has a hard time moving on from a break-up, but he is lucky to have supportive friends.

name: It's Complicated
summary_text: When attending their son's college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. But the complicated fact is they're divorced and he's remarried.

name: Enter the Dragon
summary_text: A secret agent comes to an opium lord's island fortress with other fighters for a martial-arts tournament.

name: The Orphanage
summary_text: A woman brings her family back to her childhood home, which used to be an orphanage for handicapped children. Before long, her son starts to communicate with an invisible new friend.

name: Baby Daddy
summary_text: A 20-something bachelor bartender becomes an unlikely parent when an ex-girlfriend leaves a baby girl on his doorstep.

name: The Return of the Living Dead
summary_text: When two bumbling employees at a medical supply warehouse accidentally release a deadly gas into the air, the vapors cause the dead to rise again as zombies.

name: Sleeping with the Enemy
summary_text: A young woman fakes her own death in an attempt to escape her nightmarish marriage, but discovers it is impossible to elude her controlling husband.

name: Wagon Train
summary_text: Stories of the journeys of a wagon train as it leaves post-Civil War Missouri on its way to California through the plains, deserts, and Rocky Mountains.

name: Rambo
summary_text: In Thailand, John Rambo joins a group of mercenaries to venture into war-torn Burma, and rescue a group of Christian aid workers who were kidnapped by the ruthless local infantry unit.

name: Wayne's World
summary_text: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

name: Grand Isle
summary_text: A young father is charged with murder and must prove his innocence by recalling a very twisted and dark night of events.

name: The Knick
summary_text: A look at the professional and personal lives of the staff at New York's Knickerbocker Hospital during the early part of the twentieth century.

name: Heavenly Creatures
summary_text: Two teenage girls share a unique bond; their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

name: The Piano Teacher
summary_text: A young man romantically pursues his masochistic piano teacher.

name: Country Comfort
summary_text: An aspiring young country singer (Katharine McPhee) finds the band she's been missing when she takes a job as nanny for a musically talented family: a rugged cowboy (Eddie Cibrian) and his five children.

name: The Karate Kid Part II
summary_text: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.

name: Spin City
summary_text: Mike Flaherty, the Deputy Mayor of New York City, and his team of half-wits must constantly save the Mayor from embarrassment and the media. Mike is later succeeded by Charlie Crawford.

name: Hardcore Henry
summary_text: Henry is resurrected from death with no memory, and he must save his wife from a telekinetic warlord with a plan to bio-engineer soldiers.

name: Kung Fu Panda 3
summary_text: Continuing his "legendary adventures of awesomeness", Po must face two hugely epic, but different threats: one supernatural and the other a little closer to home.

name: Belle
summary_text: The mixed-race daughter, Dido Elizabeth Belle (Gugu Mbatha-Raw), of Royal Navy Captain Sir John Lindsay (Matthew Goode) is raised by aristocratic Great-uncle Lord William Murray, 1st Earl of Mansfield (Tom Wilkinson) in eighteenth century England.

name: Prospect
summary_text: A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote alien moon, aiming to strike it rich. They've secured a contract to harvest a large deposit of the elusive gems hidden in the depths of the moon's toxic forest. But there are others roving the wilderness and the job quickly devolves into a fight to survive. Forced to contend not only with the forest's other ruthless inhabitants, but with her own ...                See full summary »

name: Wrong Turn 6: Last Resort
summary_text: An inheritance leads a young man and his friends to an abandoned resort inhabited by two sketchy caretakers and a clan of mutant cannibals.

name: Allied
summary_text: In 1942, a Canadian intelligence officer in North Africa encounters a female French Resistance fighter on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of war.

name: Assassin's Creed
summary_text: Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar de Nerha and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, before taking on the secret Templar society.

name: Resident Evil: Retribution
summary_text: Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility.

name: Some Kind of Wonderful
summary_text: When Keith goes out with Amanda, the girl of his dreams, Amanda's ex-boyfriend plans to get back at Keith. Meanwhile, Keith's best friend, tomboy Watts, realizes she has feelings for Keith.

name: The Beatles: Get Back
summary_text: Documentary about the music group The Beatles featuring in-studio footage that was shot in early 1969 for the 1970 feature film 'Let It Be.'

name: The Devil's Rejects
summary_text: The murderous, backwoods Firefly family take to the road to escape the vengeful Sheriff Wydell, who is not afraid of being as ruthless as his target.

name: The Card Counter
summary_text: The film, written and directed by Schrader, follows William Tell (Isaac), a gambler and former serviceman who sets out to reform a young man seeking revenge on a mutual enemy from their ...                See full summary »

name: Hail, Caesar!
summary_text: A Hollywood fixer in the 1950s works to keep the studio's stars in line.

name: Out of the Furnace
summary_text: When Rodney Baze mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell, takes matters into his own hands to find justice.

name: Your Lie in April
summary_text: A piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his childhood is forced back into the spotlight by an eccentric girl with a secret of her own.

name: Rock Star
summary_text: Lead singer of a tribute band becomes lead singer of the real band he idolizes.

name: The Way Way Back
summary_text: Shy 14-year-old Duncan goes on summer vacation with his mother, her overbearing boyfriend, and her boyfriend's daughter. Having a rough time fitting in, Duncan finds an unexpected friend in Owen, manager of the Water Wizz water park.

name: Timecrimes
summary_text: A man accidentally gets into a time machine and travels back in time nearly an hour. Finding himself will be the first of a series of disasters of unforeseeable consequences.

name: Drive Angry
summary_text: A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.

name: Snakes on a Plane
summary_text: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly venomous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

name: Hanna
summary_text: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.

name: Cube
summary_text: Six complete strangers with widely varying personalities are involuntarily placed in an endless maze containing deadly traps.

name: Presumed Innocent
summary_text: As a lawyer investigates the murder of a colleague, he finds himself more connected to the crime than anyone else.

name: So Not Worth It
summary_text: New friends, new loves and new experiences mix together inside a colorful college dormitory in Korea that's home to students from around the world.

name: Over the Hedge
summary_text: A scheming raccoon fools a mismatched family of forest creatures into helping him repay a debt of food, by invading the new suburban sprawl that popped up while they were hibernating...and learns a lesson about family himself.

name: The Postcard Killings
summary_text: A New York detective investigates the death of his daughter who was murdered while on her honeymoon in London; he recruits the help of a Scandinavian journalist when other couples throughout Europe suffer a similar fate.

name: Wyatt Earp
summary_text: From Wichita to Dodge City to the O.K. Corral in Tombstone, a man becomes a myth in this thrilling journey of romance, adventure and desperate, heroic action.

name: Slasher
summary_text: An anthology series featuring rampaging serial killers leaving carnage in their wake as their next victims fight to stay alive.

name: Kung Fu Hustle
summary_text: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.

name: Food Wars
summary_text: Soma Yukihira enrolls in an elite culinary school to become a full-time chef and surpass his father's culinary skills.

name: Marvel Studios: Legends
summary_text: This series showcases individual characters from the MCU viewers have come to know and love over the years and revisit some of their most iconic moments.

name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
summary_text: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

name: Tales from the Crypt
summary_text: Tales of horror based on the gruesome E.C. comic books of the 1950s presented by the legendary Crypt Keeper, a sinister ghoul obsessed with gallows humor and horrific puns.

name: Naked and Afraid XL
summary_text: A group of amateur survivalists are put to the ultimate test in the wild for 40 days with nothing but a few primitive tools. No food. No clothing. No water. They must hunt and gather whatever they need until extraction day.

name: Addicted
summary_text: A gallerist risks her family and flourishing career when she enters into an affair with a talented painter and slowly loses control of her life.

name: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
summary_text: Some of Sin City's most hard-boiled citizens cross paths with a few of its more reviled inhabitants.

name: Extinction
summary_text: A father has a recurring dream of losing his family. His nightmare turns into reality when the planet is invaded by a force bent on destruction. Fighting for their lives, he comes to realize an unknown strength to keep them safe from harm.

name: Operation Finale
summary_text: A team of secret agents set out to track down the Nazi officer who masterminded the Holocaust.

name: Tales from the Loop
summary_text: The townspeople who live above "The Loop," a machine built to unlock and explore the mysteries of the universe, experience things previously consigned to the realm of science fiction.

name: The Hot Chick
summary_text: An attractive and popular teenager, who is mean-spirited toward others, finds herself in the body of an older man, and must find a way to get back to her original body.

name: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion
summary_text: Two dim-witted, inseparable friends hit the road for their ten-year high school reunion and concoct an elaborate lie about their lives in order to impress their classmates.

name: Urban Cowboy
summary_text: Bud is a young man from the country who learns about life and love in a Houston bar.

name: Noah
summary_text: Noah is chosen by God to undertake a momentous mission before an apocalyptic flood cleanses the world.

name: White House Down
summary_text: While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

name: The Night of the Grizzly
summary_text: Ex-lawman Jim Cole retires to Wyoming to farm his land, but a land-greedy neighbor, an ex-con turned bounty hunter, and a vicious grizzly bear upset his retirement plans.

name: Ocean's Thirteen
summary_text: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.

name: Intruder
summary_text: Rebecca and Sam's lives are turned upside down when two teenagers break into their coast home.

name: The Addams Family
summary_text: The eccentrically macabre family moves to a bland suburb where Wednesday Addams' friendship with the daughter of a hostile and conformist local reality show host exacerbates conflict between the families.

name: The Descendants
summary_text: A land baron tries to reconnect with his two daughters after his wife is seriously injured in a boating accident.

name: Critical Role
summary_text: A live weekly show, where a band of professional voice actors improvise, role-play and roll their way through an epic Dungeons & Dragons campaign.

name: Due Date
summary_text: High-strung father-to-be Peter Highman is forced to hitch a ride with aspiring actor Ethan Tremblay on a road trip in order to make it to his child's birth on time.

name: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
summary_text: James Bond woos a mob boss' daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Ernst Stavro Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps involving beautiful women from around the world.

name: Hospital Playlist
summary_text: Hospital Playlist tells the story of five doctors who have been friends since they entered medical school in 1999.

name: The Man from Earth
summary_text: An impromptu goodbye party for Professor John Oldman becomes a mysterious interrogation after the retiring scholar reveals to his colleagues he has a longer and stranger past than they can imagine.

name: Let Them All Talk
summary_text: A famous author goes on a cruise trip with her friends and nephew in an effort to find fun and happiness while she comes to terms with her troubled past.

name: End of Watch
summary_text: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

name: Scream 4
summary_text: Ten years have passed, and Sidney Prescott, who has put herself back together thanks in part to her writing, is visited by the Ghostface Killer.
